thread.title: Great hotel in a convenient lcoation
thread.title_full: Great hotel in a convenient lcoation - Review of Ramada New York/Eastside, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: John T
title: Great hotel in a convenient lcoation
text:
When I booked this hotel, I thought it would just be an average limited service hotel. However, upon checkin and entering the room, I was surprised by the simple service and large spacious/modernized rooms. The rooms are definitely comfortable and it serves all of my needs. This is going to be my go-to place if I'm looking for affordable hotels in NYC.
Room Tip: king beds were really nice See more room tips
